name: Inch-by-Inch
description:
A two-player game where both players control one section of an inchworm and must work together to reach the end or rage and quit trying.

Programmers:  Matt "Smooth" Stanton & Logan Cooper 

Designers: Cameron Petroccione & Michael Lonardo

Audio/Music Producer: Jesse Graziano

(Made for Summer Game Jam 2022 @N.E.I.T.)
